name: Acushnet Holdings Corp.
description: Acushnet Holdings Corp. is the parent company of Titleist and FootJoy, leading brands in the golf equipment and apparel industry. Founded in 1910, Acushnet has established itself as a pioneer in innovation and quality, creating products that enhance the performance and enjoyment of golfers worldwide. Titleist is best known for its high-performance golf balls, including the iconic Pro V1, which has become a favorite among professional and amateur players alike. The brand also offers a wide range of golf clubs and accessories designed with cutting-edge technology to improve accuracy and distance. FootJoy, another flagship brand under Acushnet, specializes in premium golf footwear, gloves, and apparel, providing golfers with comfort and style on the course. The company's commitment to research and development ensures that it remains at the forefront of the golf industry, continually introducing new products that meet the evolving needs of golfers. Acushnet is dedicated to promoting the sport of golf and supporting its growth through various initiatives, including partnerships with golf courses and organizations. By focusing on quality, performance, and innovation, Acushnet Holdings Corp. has cemented its reputation as a trusted name in golf, appealing to both serious competitors and casual players.

seo.meta_title: Acushnet Holdings Corp. | Golf Equipment and Apparel
seo.meta_description: Explore Acushnet Holdings Corp., the parent company of Titleist and FootJoy, known for premium golf balls, clubs, and apparel. Discover their commitment to innovation and quality.

faq.question: What brands does Acushnet own?
faq.answer: Acushnet owns Titleist and FootJoy, among other brands.

faq.question: What is Acushnet known for?
faq.answer: Acushnet is known for its high-quality golf balls, clubs, and apparel.

faq.question: Where is Acushnet headquartered?
faq.answer: Acushnet is headquartered in Fairhaven, Massachusetts, USA.
